content.name: Wedge Ship
content.description: Classic wedge-shaped spacecraft from Spacewar! (1962). The iconic triangular ship design from the first computer game. Agile fighter with limited fuel and torpedo capacity.
content.lore: Player 1's ship in the original Spacewar! Recognizable by its distinctive wedge profile, this vessel became one of gaming's first iconic player avatars.
content.gameplay_notes: Identical mechanics to needle ship - visual distinction only. Original PDP-1 used vector graphics to render the outline.
